Package model

Class GraphicalDeck

java.lang.Object
model.GraphicalDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeckADT
public class GraphicalDeck
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeckADT
Concrete class of the DeckADT interface that is built for graphical card games.
Version:
2020-12-10
Author:
Devon X. Dalrymple

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GraphicalDeck()
    Default constructor for a deck that creates a list of cards and shuffles them
    GraphicalDeck​(Card[] cards)
    Creates a deck from cards provided to the constructor then it shuffles them.

  • Constructor Details

    • GraphicalDeck

      public GraphicalDeck()
      Default constructor for a deck that creates a list of cards and shuffles them

    • GraphicalDeck

      public GraphicalDeck​(Card[] cards)
      Creates a deck from cards provided to the constructor then it shuffles them. Still allows 52 cards
      Parameters:
      cards - An array of model.Card that is to be used instead of 52 cards.
